content: Once you've harvested all the plants along the river, return up to the Brook Shrine, and head up the hill taking the road to the left.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
Once you've harvested all the plants along the river, return up to the Brook Shrine, and head up the hill taking the road to the left.
